DOC.brief_summary: A study of the efficacy and tolerability of two different ketogenic diets in children with drug resistant epilepsy; children resistant to at least two drugs randomised to reveive diet after baseline or after further 3m control period; in addition randomised to either MCT or classical ketogenic diet.
DOC.brief_title: RCT of the Efficacy of the Ketogenic Diet in the Treatment of Epilepsy
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of epilepsy for at least 2 years, resistant to at least two AEDs, at least 7 seizures/week
